items.title: Record U.S. government shutdown is over—but Wall Street only has 10 weeks to relax before the next one could begin
items.description: U.S. government shutdown ends after 43 days, but markets brace for another funding fight as investors weigh lost data and Fed uncertainty.

items.title: The CEO of $2.2 billion AI company Turing can’t live without ChatGPT, swears by his Kindle, and has only taken 2 weeks of vacation in 7 years

items.title: Russia’s first AI-powered robot walked on stage to triumphant music, took a few steps, and then immediately faceplanted
items.description: AIdol has some work to do before it can catch up to its western competition.

items.title: New Cash App features let users send and receive stablecoins, pay merchants in Bitcoin
items.description: Dorsey, who also cofounded Twitter, has long been a Bitcoin devotee.

items.title: Hilton’s CEO focused on rebuilding the hotel giant’s culture. Now its staff turnover is about half the industry average
